author: USA TODAY, Joey Garrison, USA TODAY
title: Nearly one-third of Americans believe a coronavirus vaccine exists and is being withheld, survey finds
description: The Democracy Fund + UCLA Nationscape Project with USA TODAY found some misinformation about the coronavirus is more widespread that you might think.
content:
Protestors drive their cars across the Market Street Bridge in Chattanooga, Tennessee on April 19, 2020.
 (Photo: Robin Rudd, AP)
Nearly one-third of Americans believe a vaccine already exists to prevent coronavirus infection but is being withheld from the … [+5842 chars]
